attributes.action: Mobility Scooter numbers in Town Centres
attributes.additional_details: Mobility scooters are becoming alarming features to pedestrians in many town centres due to the dangers of their numbers and size.  While these are intended and indeed necessary for the disabled, many users do not actually need them.  Once acquired as trendy accessories, users quickly accustom to their convenience becoming seduced into laziness and hopeless obesity through of lack of exercise.  A 'doctors certificate' should be made mandatory for their use and their size and type categorised.
